channel.title: AZMonitor
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Entra ID and Microsoft Azure.

item.title: üÜï ADDED Entra role
item.description:
Id: 9f06204d-73c1-4d4c-880a-6edb90606fd8
Display name: Azure AD Joined Device Local Administrator
Description: Users assigned to this role are added to the local administrators group on Microsoft Entra joined devices.
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/9f06204d-73c1-4d4c-880a-6edb90606fd8

item.title: üÜï ADDED Entra role
item.description:
Id: aaf43236-0c0d-4d5f-883a-6955382ac081
Display name: B2C IEF Keyset Administrator
Description: Can manage secrets for federation and encryption in the Identity Experience Framework (IEF).
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/aaf43236-0c0d-4d5f-883a-6955382ac081

item.title: üÜï ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 7ec7ccdc-f61e-41fe-9aaf-980df0a44eba
Display name: AgFood Platform Service Reader
Description: Provides read access to AgFood Platform Service
Link: https://management.azure.com/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/7ec7ccdc-f61e-41fe-9aaf-980df0a44eba?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: üÜï ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: a2138dac-4907-4679-a376-736901ed8ad8
Display name: AnyBuild Builder
Description: Basic user role for AnyBuild. This role allows listing of agent information and execution of remote build capabilities.
Link: https://management.azure.com/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/a2138dac-4907-4679-a376-736901ed8ad8?api-version=2022-04-01
